name: Insufferable
description: Villagers markup their prices when trading with you, and Iron Golems attack on sight.

actions.command: data modify entity @s Gossips prepend value {Type:"major_negative",Value:25,Target:[I;-1166469461,-1413460234,-1975305955,-1073877043]}
data modify entity @s Gossips[0].Target set from entity @p UUID

entity_action.command: execute as @e[type=minecraft:iron_golem,distance=..10] run data modify entity @s AngryAt set from entity @p UUID
